Program Delivery
The program will deliver learning in an accelerated mode with a focus on developing application skills. Participants will be able to apply the concepts learnt to their real time business problems. This will be achieved through the curriculum design - there will be 12 core courses in the first year. In the second year students can choose three core and three specialized track papers .  To accelerate career growth the program will provide participants with mandatory on-the-job learning opportunities.
Duration: 2 years/ 4 Semesters (Full Time) Timings : 07:25 AM - 12:00 PM Classroom Session        1:00 PM - 5:30 PM Internship Session
Program Highlights
*On-the-job learning method - a two year-long, four-part course—gives students meaningful and numerous opportunities to act like leaders, translating their ideas into practice.
why_choose: Why choose this course? Program design covers Conceptualization to Product Development Curriculum is based on concepts in entrepreneurial settings. Field Visits to Start-ups that will provide appropriate exposure Partnership with Incubators, Accelerators, Innovation labs for students Program delivery by Industry leading professionals with entrepreneurships Engagement with Leading Corporates to expose Incubation Programs
what_learn: What you will learn? Develop the ability to address complex social and market challenges with innovative solutions. Gain practical knowledge through experiential learning, internships, and corporate immersion programs. Build entrepreneurial expertise to create sustainable business models and manage ventures effectively. Understand and apply business design thinking, innovation strategies, and management principles. Learn to leverage digital tools and technologies to develop disruptive business models. Acquire insights into incubation processes, feasibility studies, and sustainability practices. Foster a mindset for nation-building and social responsibility through entrepreneurship.
modules: Modules Startup India Family Business Start-up Idea Generation Lean Startup methodology Year 1 Engineering The Startup Journey Business Leadership and Communication Social Innovation and Entrepreneurship ESG Strategy for start-ups Market Research for Start-up Proof of Concept & Startup Value Chain Financing the Venture PMF – Product Market Fit MVP – Minimum Viable Product Scaling the Business Year 2 Entrepreneurial Sales for New Venture Entrepreneurial Strategy in Turnaround environment Design Thinking & Innovation Application Go-To-Market Strategy for the Start Up Marketing Plan-Digital Marketing Strategy Structuring the Start-up –Setting up the Business for Growth Distribution Strategy for the New Venture
career: Career prospects The approach is transformational in nature filled with the most updated concepts from the start-up world to drive successful entrepreneurship behaviour. The Tools and methodology engineers the students to become smart start-up founders at the end of the course. Program is designed to benefit students from Family Business Background, New Business Entrepreneurs and students who wish to pursue intrapreneurship career. Key concepts include ESG, Lean Start-up approach, Minimum Viable Product, Product Market Fit, Business analytics and visualisation, Go to Market strategy, Elevator pitch practise, Launch requirements in India, to name a few. Networking opportunities will expose students to interface with leaders from Unicorns, new age start-up founders and experts from Industry. Guest lectures and interactions with mentors, alumni entrepreneurs and professionals from Private Equity/Venture Capital funding eco system.
